DOC.brief_summary: This randomise control trial establish effect contraceptive intervention deliver mobile phone text message acceptability effective contraception Palestine . Woman age 18-24 randomised receive 0-3 text message day 4 month ( intervention ) monthly text message contraception ( control ) . Participants complete questionnaire baseline 4 month follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Delivered Text Message Increase Acceptability Effective Contraception Among Young Women Palestine
DOC.criteria: Aged 1824 year Own personal mobile phone Not use pill , implant , injection , intrauterine device patch Live West Bank Can read Arabic
